title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for Aug. 8
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for Aug. 8
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day" Tabula Rasa HealthCare (TRHC). Tabula Rasa HealthCare Inc.'s shares climbed to a record after the developer of Internet-based software reported second-quarter results. Revenue beat analysts' average estimate in a Bloomberg survey, extending a streak that started after Tabula Rasa went public last September. The company also indicated that third- quarter sales may exceed projections.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
